<title level="1" right="Rules">[Hardness](/Rules.aspx?ID=2183)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 274 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Whenever a shield takes damage, the amount of damage it takes is reduced by this amount. This number is particularly relevant for shields because of the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=5212) feat . The rules for Hardness appear [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=2160).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
